body: How dare this stupid guy choose a hag over to a pure loli who only thinks about you. This is bullshit man.

You know.
This is the kind of stuff I like...

I mean. You find youself a loli that loves you... like... truly loves you.
She's happy about being and doing anything with you even if that's just once or twice a year. If that wasn't enough she's as cute as a doll!!
Like... she's one of the cutest characters I've seen in a long long time, and I love loli!

Too bad this guy decides to take 2 girls at the same time and probably screwing his life when the loli get's pregnant or something...

If that was me... I wouldn't marry anyone else.
I'll chose Chiharu and I'll get to enjoy the love of a loli all to myself.

If you pay attention to the panels she starts to grow up so... you'll have sex with her all of your life.
You'll get a loli that is happy doing it and you'll get a teen to make love with and eventually a beautiful woman who will take your seed and make it into a loving familly...

It's perfect!
It's just perfect!!!
